CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=1,GetNumQuestLogEntries() do SelectQuestLogEntry(i); SetAbandonQuest(); AbandonQuest(); end

CustomBehavior.Text: Fast forwarding memory to the Withering Thicket
Fast forwarding memory to the Ruins of Mathystra
Fast forwarding memory to the Shatterspear Vale

ElseIf.Condition: Me.Class == WoWClass.Priest || Me.Class == WoWClass.Mage || Me.Class == WoWClass.Warlock
